required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 14, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Preoperative COVID Testing as a Predictor of Community Disease Burden

brief_summary.textblock: This study is an investigation of preoperative asymptomatic COVID screening nationwide. The hypothesis is that because these tests are performed without reference to pretest probability of COVID-19 disease, unlike tests based on symptoms or close contact with infected individuals, they may represent a more unbiased sample of the local population prevalence of asymptomatic COVID disease burden.

detailed_description.textblock:
Study will gather publicly reported, aggregated statistics on positive COVID tests over time and across geographically diverse parts of the United States, summarized weekly, from the onset of the pandemic in Spring 2020 to the present time. Study will also gather contemporaneous data on weekly community COVID cases diagnosed, local positive test percentage, hospital admissions and ICU admissions for COVID-19, and deaths from COVID 19. Similar data will be obtained from a coalition of approximately 20 academic medical centers from around the United States, with Wake Forest School of Medicine, Department of Anesthesiology serving as the coordinating center. No individual patient information will be collected. Aggregated testing data, hospital disease burden, and local disease prevalence are all publicly reported.
We will analyze the data as interrupted time series.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of asymptomatic preoperative COVID-19 positive testing

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of hospitalization per geographic area
Percentage of death per geographic area
Percentage of asymptomatic preoperative COVID-19 positive testing per geographic area

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with a preoperative asymptomatic COVID screening test

study_pop.textblock: Publicly reported aggregate data on asymptomatic preoperative COVID tests (no individual patient information)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- having preoperative asymptomatic COVID testing
- > or = 18 years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
- None
